p: In regards to S. sclarea, EO displayed a high antioxidant activity resulting in the IC 50 values of 7.79 ± 1.06 µg/mL and 2.26 ± 0.05 µg/mL in DPPH and ABTS, respectively, while the corresponding values for the HY were 200.43 ± 28.46 µg/mL and 479.27 ± 7.89 µg/mL. EO showed TEAC values of 2.34 ± 2.36 mol/mg and 186.23 ± 4.30 mol/mg, while the corresponding HY showed values of 0.09 ± 0.01 mol/mg and 0.87 ± 0.01 mol/mg in DPPH and ABTS assays, respectively ( Table 10).
